verses.verse: (A Psalm of David, when he was in the wilderness of Judah.) O God, <S%H430><s%> Thou art my God; <S%H410><s%> I shall seek <S%H7836><s%> Thee earnestly; <S%H7836><s%> My soul <S%H5315><s%> thirsts <S%H6770><s%> for Thee, my flesh <S%H1320><s%> yearns <S%H3642><s%> for Thee, In a dry <S%H6723><s%> and weary <S%H5889><s%> land <S%H776><s%> where there is no <S%H1097><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>
Thus <S%H3651><s%> I have beheld <S%H2372><s%> Thee in the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> To see <S%H7200><s%> Thy power <S%H5797><s%> and Thy glory. <S%H9202><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> life, <S%H9132><s%> My lips <S%H8193><s%> will praise <S%H9576><s%> Thee.
So <S%H3651><s%> I will bless <S%H1288><s%> Thee as long as I live; <S%H9132><s%> I will lift <S%H5375><s%> up my hands <S%H3709><s%> in Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> is satisfied <S%H7646><s%> as with marrow <S%H2459><s%> and fatness, <S%H1880><s%> And my mouth <S%H6310><s%> offers <S%H1984><s%> praises <S%H1984><s%> with joyful <S%H7445><s%> lips. <S%H8193><s%>
When <S%H518><s%> I remember <S%H2142><s%> Thee on my bed, <S%H3326><s%> I meditate <S%H1897><s%> on Thee in the night watches, <S%H821><s%>
For Thou hast been <S%H1961><s%> my help, <S%H5833><s%> And in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of Thy wings <S%H3671><s%> I sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy. <S%H7442><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> clings <S%H1692><s%> to Thee; Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> upholds <S%H8551><s%> me.
But those <S%H1992><s%> who seek <S%H1245><s%> my life, <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H9585><s%> it, Will go <S%H935><s%> into the depths <S%H8482><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
They will be delivered <S%H5064><s%> over <S%H5064><s%> to the power <S%H3027><s%> of the sword; <S%H2719><s%> They will be a prey <S%H4521><s%> for foxes. <S%H7776><s%>

But the king <S%H4428><s%> will rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in God; <S%H430><s%> Everyone <S%H3605><s%> who swears <S%H7650><s%> by Him will glory, <S%H1984><s%> For the mouths <S%H6310><s%> of those who speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> will be stopped. <S%H5534><s%>
